about_the_game:
Do you have the guts to rule an entire Pingdom? Get your Penguins to gather resources to either build up a strong defence for the incoming waves of enemies, or to upgrade and unlock new structures. Use the space efficiently as your island expands.

Penguins Of Different Species



Send out your curious Penguins on adventures to find DNA structures to bring new species to life. Different species have different perks, therefore they are good at different things. (Some are good at mining while others are good crafters)

Expand Your Island With Biomes



Defeat waves of enemies and bosses not just to survive but also to get rewards as an Island Upgrade.
Island Upgrades is used to expand your island to gain more resources and land to build on. So use your resources efficiently so you dont run out. Different Island Upgrades have different biomes as Forest, Deep Forest, Lake, Mountains and Icy Mountains.

Defend Your Pingdom From The Evil Forces Of Turtles



Enemy spawns are random every wave but the difficulty increases each time. Every fifth wave one of all Bosses will appear, after defeat it will give you great rewards. Different bosses have unique attack abilities.
